item.title: Nike’s founder, a Walmart heiress, and the owner of the Dallas Cowboys are among the billionaires bankrolling March Madness Sweet 16 schools
item.description: Some of America’s wealthiest have donated millions of dollars to the U.S. schools with the top-ranked basketball programs.

item.title: This mom’s whole body MRI scan revealed a potentially life-threatening ‘ticking time bomb’
item.description: “It did kind of feel like a spa day, until it didn't.”

item.title: Misaligned incentives plague our health-care system. Here’s how to make America healthy again
item.description: Health care will become more preventative once providers have the right incentives and technology.

item.title: Amid a grimmer outlook from the Fed, there’s a lone, mysterious holdout predicting stronger economic growth
item.description: The Fed’s consensus for GDP growth dropped from 2.1% to 1.7% after its latest round of economic forecasts published Wednesday.

item.title: Americans finally got a rule protecting their credit scores from unexpected medical debt. Now Trump is attacking the agency behind it
item.description: The policy to remove health-care bills from credit reporting must remain to protect patients from predatory billing practices.
